home.recovery_title: How to Respond to a Hack
home.recovery_desc: Step-by-step interactive guide for recovering a compromised account. Covers initial response, contacting Sony, filing complaints, and securing your account.
home.incidents_desc: Notable documented cases of PSN account theft, revealing patterns in how attacks occur and systemic issues in Sony's response process.
home.intelligence_desc: Curated information on the individuals and methods behind PSN account thefts, including screenshots and community-contributed analysis.
home.about_p1: PlayStation Network account thefts are a widespread problem that Sony has been slow to address. Victims frequently report that support channels are inadequate, resolution processes are opaque, and recovered accounts are subsequently banned due to actions taken by the hackers.
home.about_p2: This site collects anonymous incident reports to document the scale of the problem, identify patterns in how attacks occur, and provide actionable guidance for victims. No personal information is ever published.
home.about_disclaimer: This is an independent consumer safety resource. It is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or operated by Sony Interactive Entertainment.

report.title: Report an Incident
report.intro: Submit an anonymous report of your PSN account theft. Especially if the account was protected by two-factor either SMS or passkey. You do not need to reveal your PSN Id, email, or anything else private. Stories are reviewed and if the details add up, they will be published in the Incidents page, suitably anonymized.
